column3: Kɔ Farao nkyɛn: na mepirim n'akoma
column5: ama meeyi me nsɛnkyerɛdze yi akyerɛ no wɔ hɔn mu:"

column3: nye wo ba ne ba asomu
column4: ndzɛmba a mayɛ no wɔ Egypt do
column5: na me nsɛnkyerɛdze a mayɛ no wɔ hɔn mu; ama hom eehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron kɔr Farao nkyɛn
column3: na wɔkɛsee no dɛ
column5: Hebriwfo Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column6: Eropow dɛ ebrɛ woho adze wɔ m'enyim ma ekodu dabɛn? Ma me man nkɔ

column2: "Na sɛ ammpen ma me man aannkɔ a
column3: hwɛ
column4: ɔkyena medze mbɛbɛw bɛba wo ntoaado:"

column3: dɛ obi nnkotum ehu asaase: na wobedzi edzinkaa a ɔsorbo no gyaae ma ɔkae maa hom no
column4: na wobedzi dua biara a ɔrefefɛw wɔ haban mu ama hom no:"

column3: nye wo nkowaa nyinara efi mu
column4: nye Egyptfo nyinara efi mu amaama; dɛ mbrɛ w'egyanom
column5: nye w'egyanom hɔn egyanom nnhun bi pɛn ofi da a wɔdze baa asaase do dze bodu ndɛ da yi. Na ɔdaan noho

column2: "Na Farao no nkowaa see no dɛ
column3: Nyimpa yi bɛtseetsee hɛn araa ma ekodu dabɛn? Ma nkorɔfo no nkɔ
column4: ma wɔnkɔsom EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn no. Ana Egypt asɛɛ yi innhu bi a?"

column2: "Na wɔdze Moses nye Aaron baa Farao nkyɛn bio: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ nkɔsom EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn: na woananom ara na wɔbɔkɔ?"
Yɛnye hɛn mbofra nye hɛn mpanyin bɔkɔ
column4: yɛnye hɛn mbabanyin na ɔnye hɛn mbabaa
column5: yɛnye hɛn nguan na ɔnye hɛn anantwi bɔkɔ; osiandɛ otwar dɛ yɛhyɛ fa ma EWURADZE."

column3: Hm
column6: nye hom mbofraba no akɔ yi: mutum hu dɛ bɔn na ɔwɔ hom adwen mu."

column2: "Dabida: hom a hom yɛ mbanyin no ara nkɔ
column3: na wɔnkɔsom EWURADZE; na ɔnoara nye dza hom rohwehwɛ. Na woyii hɔn edzi fii Farao enyim."
Tsen wo nsa wɔ Egypt asaase do
column6: na wɔmbɔwe asaase no do efuw nyinara
column7: mekyerɛ dza ɔsorbo no egyaa no nyinara."

column2: "Na Moses tseen no poma no wɔ Egypt asaase do
column3: na EWURADZE dze boka mframa bɔɔ asaase no do da no nyinara
column4: na anadwe no nyinara; na anapa no
column5: boka mframa dze mbɛbɛw no bae."

column2: "Na mbɛbɛw no kɔr Egypt asaase nyinara do
column3: na wɔkɛgyegyee Egypt ntoaado nyinara; wɔdɔɔ so dodow; mbɛbɛw biara a ɔtse dɛm mbaa pɛn
column4: na hɔn ekyir so bi nnkɛba dɛm da."

column3: ma isum gyee asaase no do; na wɔwee asaase no do efuw nyinara
column4: nye ndua a ɔsorbo no gyaae no do aba nyinara: na adze momon biara annka a ɔyɛ dua anaa haban mu efuw

column2: "Nna Farao maa wɔkɛfrɛɛ Moses nye Aaron ntsɛmara; na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
mepa wo kyɛw
column4: fa mo bɔn fir me prɛko yi ara
column5: na hom mpa EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn kyɛw
column6: ma onyi owu yi ara mfi mo do."

column3: na ɔkɛpaa EWURADZE kyɛw."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze daan anee mframa dzendzen mbordo a ɔbɛfaa mbɛbɛw no
column3: na ɔdze hɔn koguu Mbɛw Po no mu; abɛbɛw kor mpo annka wɔ Egypt ntoaado nyinara."
na ɔamma Israelmba no annkɔ."
Tsen wo nsa wɔ sor
column4: ma sum mbra Egypt asaase do
column5: mekyerɛ sum a wosuo mu a ɔbɛyɛ a yie."

column2: "Na Moses tseen ne nsa wɔ sor; na sum kebii hyɛɛ Egypt asaase nyinara dze
column3: do nda ebiasa;"
nkyii so obiara annsoɛr emmfi ne tsenabew nda ebiasa: na Israelmba nyinara wonyaa kan wɔ hɔn efiefi."
na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hom nkɔ nkɔsom EWURADZE; hom nguan nye hom anantwi nko na wɔmma wɔnka: wɔmma hom mbofraba no so nye hom nkɔ."

column3: Ohia dɛ edze okum afɔrbɔdze nye ɔhyew afɔrbɔdze so hyɛ hɛn nsa ama yaabɔ afɔr ama EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Hɛn mbowa so nye hɛn bɔkɔ; ɔnnkɛka abowaanamɔn mpo wɔ ekyir; na ɔno mu bi na otwar dɛ yɛkɛfa som EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn; na yennyim dza yɛdze bɔsom EWURADZE
column3: gyedɛ yedu hɔ ana."
na ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔma wɔkɔ."
Fi mo do kɔ
column5: mma nnhu m'enyim bio; na da a ibohu m'enyim no ibowu."

column3: Aka no yie; munnkohu w'enyim bio."
